item.title: Fluent Python 例18-2 スピナー
item.description:

<style>div.bk-hbox {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

div.bk-hbox div.bk-plot {
    padding: 8px;
}

div.bk-hbox div.bk-data-table {
    padding: 20px;
}

div.hololayout {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  margin: 0;
}

div.holoframe {
  width: 75%;
}

div.holowell {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

form.holoform {
  background-color: #fafafa;
  border-radius: 5px;
  overflow: hidden;
  padding-left: 0.8em;
  padding-right: 0.8em …</style>
item.dc:creator: daizutabi
